columns.text: ‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view. Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience. Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description: Being placed at the top of the cliff and with an excellent view to Caldera, the renovated villa consists of two bedrooms with queen size beds and two bathrooms with bath tubs.
items.excerpt: Being placed at the top of the cliff and with an excellent view to Caldera, the renovated villa consists of two bedrooms with queen size beds and two bathrooms with bath tubs.
items.amenities:
Key feature & selling points

  • 2 suites and 4 double studios with individually designed rooms
  • Tailor made services prior to arrival, such as, online check in, room scent and temperature, in house music and movies, candle light and rose petals decoration, satin beds sheets and more…
  • Especially for honeymooners: room decoration with candles and one bottle of champagne
  • Audio visual includes: free Wi-Fi internet access, LCD TV satellite channels, DVD / CD / radio / Mp3 player
  • Complimentary private parking is available on site

items.title: Opera Mansion Villa Santorini
items.description: The old emblematic Opera of Santorini dating back to the 19th century has been totally renovated, transformed into the absolute epitome of luxury in the heart of the island. In perfect alignment with the traditional Theran architecture, the Opera Mansion is a cave-like building boasting ample spaces and splendidly lavish features. In the very same place where the first modern Hellenic Theatre performance was held, couples relax and enjoy a luxurious stay , combining the scent of traditional Santorini with state-of-the-art amenities, private pools and amazing volcano view , just a breath from the imposing caldera and the central Fira path.Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.Upon reaching Opera Mansion, our team of professionals welcomes you to a whole new level of discreet services where privacy is never compromised and there is still always someone to tend to your every need or desire. From the special breakfast served in the vastness of the mansion with a fine selection of freshly baked pastries and high-quality ingredients to the concierge services eager to organize a private candlelight dinner under the starlit sky, you experience the ultimate fusion of romance, luxurious attentiveness and care.
items.excerpt: Opera Mansion provides the idyllic setting for couples seeking to isolate themselves from the world, without lacking anything in terms of smooth accessibility to the vibrant nightlife and omnipresent lifestyle of Fira.

items.title: Above Blue Villa Santorini
items.description: The view to the stiff cliffs and the village of Oia is breathtaking during the day, while in the afternoon hours the direct view to the world’s most famous sunset is unbeatable. Feel the ultimate luxury in this cave villa by having your own private plunge pool with Jacuzzi jets. The view to the stiff cliffs and the village of Oia is breathtaking during the day, while in the afternoon hours the direct view to the world’s most famous sunset is unbeatable. The Above Blue Villa is made for those who want to enjoy the extra space and all the comforts that a superb villa like this can offer. Sun loungers in the spacious patio, sauna room, a double day bed, your personal notebook, three sitting areas, wireless Internet and much more. The main Bedroom is attached to a very convenient sitting area and has direct access to the master bathroom with the marbled mosaic dressed shower. The second area consists of a living room, a cozy loft bedroom and a second bathroom with shower. For extra comfort there is a third area that the sauna room is located and also a second small loft with the double day bed. From a small cozy lounge you can exit directly into the private plunge pool.Ideal for families with teens, or even for two couples, since a connecting door is totally separating the two areas while both of them have direct access to the patio. During spring and fall, the pool water can be heated with an extra fee. (24 Hours notice is required). Relax in the shade under the umbrella or lazy lay to the day bed without missing the view to the pool, the cliffs and Oia.Located 50m next to the main hotel building, this unique Villa is the absolute experience that someone can have.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Above Blue Villa Santorini is a luxury villa in the picturesque village of Imerovigli. Enjoy a private pool & views of the sea and Oia.

amenities.item: Tailor made services prior to arrival
Villa is suitable for honeymooners as well as families of up to 6 guests
Champagne glasses on the first sunset
